description: This file contains API interaction functions for managing agents and agent sessions, including creating agents, agent runs, and agent sessions, with support for both synchronous and asynchronous operations.

methods.name: create_agent_session
methods.description: Creates an agent session, either monitoring or telemetry, by sending a POST request via the authenticated API client.

methods.name: create_agent_run
methods.description: Creates an agent run, either monitoring or telemetry, by sending a POST request via the authenticated API client.

methods.name: acreate_agent_run
methods.description: Asynchronously creates an agent run, either monitoring or telemetry, by sending a POST request via the authenticated async API client.

methods.name: create_agent
methods.description: Creates an agent on the platform by sending a POST request with agent data.

methods.name: acreate_agent
methods.description: Asynchronously creates an agent on the platform by sending a POST request with agent data.
